quotes: The alien mothership! If we hit that bullseye, the rest of the dominoes will fall like a house of cards. Checkmate.
I am the man with no name. Zapp Brannigan, at your service.
All those times I said 'Kill all humans', I always whispered 'except one.' Fry was that one. And I never told him so.
My story is a lot like yours, only more interesting 'cause it involves robots.
I'm sciencing as fast as I can.
